thread.title: BRIEF-Telecity says Equinix notifies proposed acquisition
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Telecity says Equinix notifies proposed acquisition

title: BRIEF-Telecity says Equinix notifies proposed acquisition
text:
BRIEF-Telecity says Equinix notifies proposed acquisition Sept 25 
Sept 25 Telecity Group Plc : 
* Update on recommended transaction with Equinix 
* Equinix has notified its proposed acquisition of Telecity Group to European Commission for merger control approval 
* Initial deadline for decision has been set at Oct. 29, 2015 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Bengaluru Newsroom: +91 80 6749 1136) Trending On Reuters
